citation.title: Buddhist monasteries of the Western Ghats
citation.description: Locations of early Buddhist rock-cut monasteries in the Western Ghats and Konkan coast regions of India. Only the caves cut between second century BCE and the early fifth century CE are included.
citation.source: GPS, in person visits to the sites by the author
